original_text: And they stripped him and took his head and his armor, and sent messengers throughout the land of the Philistines to carry the good news to their idols and to the people.
korean_text: 곧 사울의 옷을 벗기고 그의 머리와 갑옷을 가져다가 사람을 블레셋 땅 사방에 보내 모든 이방 신전과 그 백성에게 소식을 전하고

sentences.original_text: and took his head and his armor
and sent messengers throughout the land of the Philistines
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 블레셋 사람의 온 땅에 사자를 보내어

sentences.original_text: to carry the good news to their idols and to the people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 우상과 백성에게 기쁜 소식을 전하였습니다
